name: Super Cucho
description:
A platformer about a big-eyed toad named Cucho. One morning a hungry cat woke up a toad. Cucho, having discovered that the cat food is over, goes to the supermarket. On the way, he met a magical power that moved him to an unknown world. The player has to help Cucho return home and feed his arrogant pet.

Key Features

  • 4 planets and 1 space platform


  • Learn new abilities


  • Epic Boss fights


  • Nice drum and bass soundtrack


  • Sloth!
